snippet: An adventurous and increasingly educated crowd is fueling a boom in fine wines in China and elsewhere in Asia, though prices have come down.
abstract: Affluent, adventurous and increasingly educated crowd is fueling boom in fine wines in China and elsewhere in region; Asian consumers have become major factor in global wine market, with China overtaking France and Italy as biggest consumer of reds; experts say market is maturing radiply.
lead_paragraph: An adventurous and increasingly educated crowd is fueling a boom in fine wines in China and elsewhere in Asia, though prices have come down.

headline.main: Affluent Wine Buyers in Asia Find Their Confidence
headline.print_headline: Affluent Wine Buyers in Asia Find Their Confidence

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
